AI Features.title: What is AI?
AI Features.content: Artificial Intelligence is the simulation of human intelligence in machines.

AI Features.title: Applications of AI
AI Features.content: Chatbots, image recognition, speech synthesis, recommendation systems.

AI Features.title: Types of AI
AI Features.content:
1. Narrow AI
2. General AI
3. Super AI

AI Features.title: Machine Learning
AI Features.content: A subset of AI that allows machines to learn from data without being explicitly programmed.

AI Features.title: Deep Learning
AI Features.content: A subfield of machine learning using neural networks with many layers.

AI Features.title: Natural Language Processing
AI Features.content: NLP enables machines to understand and respond in human language.

AI Features.title: Ethics in AI
AI Features.content: AI should be transparent, fair, and used responsibly to avoid bias or harm.

AI Features.title: AI in Education
AI Features.content: Smart tutoring, plagiarism detection, automated grading, personalized learning.

English.title: Parts of Speech
English.content: Noun, Pronoun, Verb, Adjective, Adverb, Preposition, Conjunction, Interjection.

English.title: Tenses
English.content: Past, Present, Future with their simple, continuous, perfect, and perfect continuous forms.

English.title: Subject-Verb Agreement
English.content: Subjects and verbs must agree in number and person.

English.title: Common Idioms
English.content: Examples: Break the ice, Hit the sack, Let the cat out of the bag.

Computer.title: What is a Computer?
Computer.content: An electronic device that processes data to produce meaningful information.

Computer.title: Operating System
Computer.content: Software that manages hardware and software resources.

Tips & Tricks.title: Study Tip: Pomodoro
Tips & Tricks.content: Study for 25 minutes, then take a 5-minute break.

Tips & Tricks.title: Memory Trick: Acronyms
Tips & Tricks.content: Use acronyms to remember lists or sequences easily.

Tips & Tricks.title: Time Management
Tips & Tricks.content: Prioritize tasks using the Eisenhower Matrix (urgent vs important).

Tips & Tricks.title: Focus Techniques
Tips & Tricks.content: Eliminate distractions, use noise-canceling headphones, stay hydrated.

Current Affairs.title: Latest Nobel Prize (2024)
Current Affairs.content: Winners announced for Physics, Chemistry, Peace, Literature, Medicine, and Economics.

Current Affairs.title: Global Climate Summit
Current Affairs.content: Countries discuss carbon neutrality, green energy, and climate funding.

Current Affairs.title: Tech Launches 2024
Current Affairs.content: Apple, Google, and Tesla announce major innovations in AI and hardware.

Current Affairs.title: Elections and Governance
Current Affairs.content: Recent elections in various nations and their global impact.
